my.__active: active patience - is when we try to interact with interlocutor, but get no answer
my.__silent: silent - is we simply wait for interaction from his side. Is worse, than active patience.

vegetability.__seedPower: seedPower - defines amount of message interchanges required to 'kill' the seed - after which vegetability penalizing will be deactivated
vegetability.__initialStrafe: Initial penalty for vegetable behaviour. Incremented for +1 after each case.
